EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Some #yStance cards have bonuses that depend on these. NL Gain #yCharges by playing #yConduit cards.
Used for #yFinishers. Gain [#FF4500]Fury[] by dealing attack damage. #yFinishers cannot generate [#FF4500]Fury[]
Used for #yFinishers. Gain [#860037]Combo[] by playing cards. #yFinishers cannot generate [#860037]Combo[]
Gain X [blademaster:WindChargeIcon] in [#00FF2A]Wind[] [#00FF2A]Stance[]. NL Gain X [blademaster:LightningChargeIcon] in [#4A8CFF]Lightning[] [#4A8CFF]Stance[].
While in [#00FF2A]Wind[] [#00FF2A]Stance[] some cards have special effects, and you can gain [blademaster:WindChargeIcon] .
While in [#4A8CFF]Lightning[] [#4A8CFF]Stance[] some cards have special effects, and you can gain [blademaster:LightningChargeIcon] .
While in [#737373]Basic[] [#737373]Stance[] you don't get any #yCharges. You start each combat in this #yStance.
